title: Message to President Vicente Mejia Colindres on Honduras' Independence Day.
text:
ON THIS memorable fifteenth of September, I offer to Your Excellency my sincere congratulations and extend my best wishes for the happiness and prosperity of your fellow countrymen.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [His Excellency Vicente Mejia Colindres, The President of Honduras, Tegucigalpa, Honduras]
